speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Kill the poys and the luggage! ’Tis expressly

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: knavery, mark you now, as can be offert, in your

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: conscience now, is it not?

speaker: GOWER
text: ’Tis certain there’s not a boy left alive, and

text: the cowardly rascals that ran from the battle ha’

speaker: GOWER
text: done this slaughter. Besides, they have burned

speaker: GOWER
text: every soldier to cut his prisoner’s throat. O, ’tis a

speaker: GOWER
text: gallant king!

speaker: GOWER
text: take it.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: porn. I tell you, captain, if you look in the maps of

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: the ’orld, I warrant you sall find, in the comparisons

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: between Macedon and Monmouth, that the

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: situations, look you, is both alike. There is a river in

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Monmouth. It is called Wye at Monmouth, but it is

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: GOWER
text: killed any of his friends.

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN

speaker: FLUELLEN
